name: Description ir to xslx
tagline: Page to demonstrate features of "GPV Interactive Report/Grid to MSExcel" APEX plugin
body:
GPV Interactive Report/Grid to XLSX v2

Get result of your Interactive Report/Grid in XLSX.
About

The "GPV Interactive Report to XML" APEX plugin lets you get results of your Interactive Report/Grid in XML-format, ready to be used in different report-tools This pack includes this plugin and IR_TO_XML package. The package includes all functionality, the plugin provides simple user interface for APEX developer to make development easier.

Many features of Interactive Reports/Grids are supported:

    Filtering and Sorting
    Control Break
    Highlights
    Computations
    Aggregations
    Simple datatypes of column (String/Date/Number)
    Column and header aligment Possibly is to include in XML values of page or application items.

This plugin make the development of different business reports based on IR/IG simpler and faster.

The minimum required APEX-version is 5.1.4
Current Version

Version 3.21
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
